original_text: And Moses took of the anointing oil, and of the blood which was upon the altar, and sprinkled it upon Aaron, and upon his garments, and upon his sons, and upon his sons' garments with him; and sanctified Aaron, and his garments, and his sons, and his sons' garments with him.
korean_text: 모세가 관유와 제단 위의 피를 가져다가 아론과 그의 옷과 그의 아들들과 그의 아들들의 옷에 뿌려서 아론과 그의 옷과 그의 아들들과 그의 아들들의 옷을 거룩하게 하고

sentences.original_text: And Moses took of the anointing oil
and of the blood which was upon the altar
and upon his sons' garments with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그 아들들의 옷에도 그와 함께 뿌렸으며

sentences.original_text: and his sons' garments with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그 아들들의 옷도 그와 함께 거룩하게 하였다
